name: HollaEx
description:
Alt+Enter = Fullscreen

How to play: Destroy the fiat invaders

TIP:

For a hard game kill the red fiat last
For an easier game kill the red fiat early

Point sheet:
1. Kill a fiat invader 2000 to 3000 points (the $)
2. Kill the red fiat 5000 (+200 for every second it lives)
3. Stay alive and gain up to 30,000
4. Destroy all fiat invaders gain 10000
5. Gain back up to 3 lives by killing the enemy

How to claim XHT rewards: If you hit top 3, share your screenshot results on https://forum.hollaex.com/ and share your XHT address from your wallet address from pro.hollaex.com

Highest possible score is around 170K and that is a perfect game
